title: Charge carrier dynamics of surface back electron/hole recombination in BiVO4 and TiO2 photoanodes
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1077-1084
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01600E, Paper
Wenjun Zhu, Yuling Yuan, Yimeng Ma
Surface back electron/hole recombination limits the water oxidation efficiency in BiVO4 due to slow water oxidation and fast recombination. TiO2 is less affected due to faster water oxidation that avoids surface recombination.
